description:
Kyoko’s Cosmo disappeared in the battle at Eris’ temple. Saori’s heart wavers as she questions her existence from not being able to save Kyoko in defeating the evil god. However, with Saori inheriting Mitsumasa Kido’s will, the Galaxian Wars start without mercy. On the other hand, Shoko who was in the hospital had been depressed from Saori telling her goodbye, and she drops the pendant of Pegasus given to her by her sister. The boy who caught it for her was Pegasus Seiya who was entering the Galaxian Wars.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 翔べ! ペガサスのように
